alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:13PM EDT until June 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LEWIS COUNTY... At 713 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Lowville, or 18 miles northwest of Old Forge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... New Bremen, Watson, Greig, Croghan, Castorland, Belfort, Soft Maple Reservoir, Kirschnerville, Beaver Falls and Indian River. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
